name: Alert Popup
author: Karthik Viswanathan
description: A small popup, with a message, action buttons, and optional title, that requires user input to dismiss.

attributes.data-fade-duration: Sets the fade in/out duration of the alert
attributes.data-location: Sets the location (top, bottom, or center) of the alert

events.show: Triggered when the alert fades in.
events.hide: Triggered when the alert fades out. Event object contains a dismissType property that holds which button was pressed (primary or secondary).

methods.display: Displays this alert and waits for user input.
methods.dismiss: Dismisses this alert given what type of button (primary or secondary) was pressed.

getters.fadeDuration: Gets the fade in/out duration of the alert
getters.location: Gets the location (top, bottom, or center) of the alert

setters.primaryText: Sets the primary button's text in the data-primary-text attribute
setters.secondaryText: Sets the secondary button's text in the data-secondary-text attribute
setters.fadeDuration: Sets the fade in/out duration of the alert in the data-fade-duration attribute
setters.location: Sets the location (top, bottom, or center) of the alert in the data-location attribute
